sourcesContent:
import React,{useContext} from "react"
import {
    CModal,
    CModalHeader,
    CButton,
    CModalBody,
    CModalFooter,
    CRow,
    CCol
  } from '@coreui/react'
  import ArticleProvider from "../context/ArticleContext"



const ModalMe=({showToast})=>{
    const {modal,setModal}=useContext(ArticleProvider.Context)
    return (
        <>
      <CButton
        onClick={()=>setModal(!modal)}
        className="mr-1"
      >Launch demo modal</CButton>
      <CModal
      size="lg"
        show={modal}
        onClose={()=>console.log("hi")}
      >
        <CModalHeader closeButton>Gallery</CModalHeader>
        <CModalBody>
          <CRow>
              <CCol></CCol>
              <CCol></CCol>
          </CRow>
        </CModalBody>
        <CModalFooter>
          <CButton color="primary">Do Something</CButton>{' '}
          <CButton
            color="secondary"
            onClick={()=>setModal(!modal)}
          >Cancel</CButton>
        </CModalFooter>
      </CModal>
    </>
           
      )

}



export default ModalMe
